meanings.definition: A tissue or organ transplanted from one individual to another of the same species.
meanings.sent1: The doctor explained that the allograft would help the patient's body heal.
meanings.sent2: The hospital performed an allograft to save the patient's life.
meanings.sent3: During the surgery, the allograft made everyone in the room feel hopeful.
meanings.sent4: The allograft was like a gift of life from one person to another.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors of the allograft tissue amazed the medical team.

meanings.definition: The process of transplanting tissue or organs from one individual to another of the same species.
meanings.sent1: The allograft procedure required careful planning by the medical team.
meanings.sent2: After the successful allograft, the patient's health improved significantly.
meanings.sent3: The hospital staff celebrated the completion of the allograft with a cake.
meanings.sent4: The allograft process was a true testament to the advancements in medicine.
meanings.sent5: The precision of the allograft surgery left a lasting impression on the doctors.
